description.zh-cn: 中华民国有关海峡两岸关系事务的主管机关，成立于1991年1月，专责统筹处理涉及中国大陆与港澳地区之政务。
description.en: The competent authority of the Republic of China (Taiwan) for cross-strait affairs, established in January 1991, responsible for coordinating and handling government affairs involving Mainland China, Hong Kong, and Macau.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高行政机关。
description.en: The executive branch of the government of the Republic of China (Taiwan).

nodes.id: 中共中央台湾工作办公室

zh-cn: 中共中央台湾工作办公室
国务院台湾事务办公室
en: Taiwan Affairs Office of the State Council
Taiwan Work Office of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国负责处理台湾事务的机构，与中共中央台湾工作办公室为“一个机构两块牌子”。
description.en: An administrative agency under the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for Taiwan-related affairs. It shares the same office with the Taiwan Work Office of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国受政府委托处理海峡两岸事务的半官方机构。
description.en: A semi-official organization in the Republic of China (Taiwan) authorized by the government to handle cross-strait affairs.

en: Association for Relations Across the Taiwan Straits

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国授权与台湾海峡交流基金会沟通的半官方机构。
description.en: A semi-official organization in the People's Republic of China authorized to communicate with Taiwan's Straits Exchange Foundation.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the Republic of China (Taiwan).

description.zh-cn: 大陆委员会的前身，由行政院以任务编组方式成立，负责协调各主管机关处理两岸事务。
description.en: The predecessor of the Mainland Affairs Council, established by the Executive Yuan as a task force to coordinate cross-strait affairs among various government agencies.

nodes.id: 光复大陆设计研究委员会

zh-cn: 光复大陆设计研究委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华民国一个已裁撤的政府机构，其业务后移交给大陆委员会等单位。
description.en: A defunct government agency of the Republic of China whose duties were later transferred to the Mainland Affairs Council and other units.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国一个已裁撤的政府机构，其部分业务后由大陆委员会承接。
description.en: A defunct government agency of the Republic of China, some of whose duties were later taken over by the Mainland Affairs Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国大陆委员会的组织法规，于2018年公布施行，法源依据此法该会正式更名为“大陆委员会”。
description.en: The organic act for the Mainland Affairs Council of the Republic of China, promulgated and enforced in 2018, under which the agency was formally renamed 'Mainland Affairs Council'.

nodes.id: 第一次两岸事务首长会议

zh-cn: 第一次两岸事务首长会议

description.zh-cn: 2014年2月，时任陆委会主委王郁琦与国台办主任张志军在南京举行的会谈，是两岸分治后首次官方事务主管负责人的正式会面。
description.en: In February 2014, a meeting was held in Nanjing between then-MAC Minister Wang Yu-chi and TAO Director Zhang Zhijun, marking the first formal meeting between the heads of official cross-strait affairs since the political division.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，现任大陆委员会主任委员。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), currently serving as the Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，现任大陆委员会政务副主任委员。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), currently serving as a Deputy Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，首任行政院大陆委员会主任委员。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), the first Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院大陆委员会主任委员。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), former Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院大陆委员会主任委员。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), former Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾代理行政院大陆委员会主任委员。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), former acting Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院大陆委员会主任委员。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), former Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院大陆委员会主任委员。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), former Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院大陆委员会主任委员及中华民国总统。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), former Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council and former President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院大陆委员会主任委员。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), former Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾两度担任行政院大陆委员会主任委员。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), served as the Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council twice.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院大陆委员会主任委员。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), former Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院大陆委员会主任委员。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), former Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院大陆委员会主任委员。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), former Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任大陆委员会主任委员。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), former Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任大陆委员会主任委员。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), former Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), former President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), former President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), former President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，现任中华民国总统。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China (Taiwan), the current President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 大陆委员会是行政院下属的中央二级行政机关。
description.en: The Mainland Affairs Council is a second-level central administrative agency under the Executive Yuan.

relationships.target: 中共中央台湾工作办公室

description.zh-cn: 2016年民进党再度执政后，两岸关系趋于对峙，双方官方近乎无直接往来。
description.en: After the Democratic Progressive Party came to power again in 2016, cross-strait relations became confrontational, with almost no direct official contact between the two sides.

description.zh-cn: 海峡交流基金会是受大陆委员会委托处理两岸事务的半官方机构。
description.en: The Straits Exchange Foundation is a semi-official organization commissioned by the Mainland Affairs Council to handle cross-strait affairs.

description.zh-cn: 海峡交流基金会与海峡两岸关系协会是两岸分别设立的对口协商机构。
description.en: The Straits Exchange Foundation and the Association for Relations Across the Taiwan Straits are the counterpart negotiating bodies established by Taiwan and mainland China, respectively.

description.zh-cn: 行政院于1988年8月以任务编组方式成立了行政院大陆工作会报，作为大陆委员会的前身。
description.en: In August 1988, the Executive Yuan established the Mainland Affairs Task Force, the predecessor to the Mainland Affairs Council.

relationships.source: 光复大陆设计研究委员会

description.zh-cn: 光复大陆设计研究委员会于1991年裁撤后，其业务移交给了大陆委员会等机构。
description.en: After the Commission for the Recovery of Mainland China was dissolved in 1991, its duties were transferred to the Mainland Affairs Council and other agencies.

description.zh-cn: 蒙藏委员会于2017年裁撤后，其情势搜整与研判业务由大陆委员会承接。
description.en: After the Mongolian and Tibetan Affairs Commission was dissolved in 2017, its situation analysis and research duties were taken over by the Mainland Affairs Council.

description.zh-cn: 根据2018年7月2日施行的《大陆委员会组织法》，原“行政院大陆委员会”更名为“大陆委员会”。
description.en: According to the 'Organic Act of the Mainland Affairs Council' implemented on July 2, 2018, the former 'Mainland Affairs Council, Executive Yuan' was renamed 'Mainland Affairs Council'.

relationships.target: 中共中央台湾工作办公室

description.zh-cn: 时任陆委会主委王郁琦访问中国大陆，并与国台办主任张志军举行了第一次两岸事务首长会议。
description.en: Then-MAC Minister Wang Yu-chi visited mainland China and held the first meeting between heads of cross-strait affairs with TAO Director Zhang Zhijun.

position.en: Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council

description.zh-cn: 在赖清德担任总统期间，邱垂正被任命为大陆委员会主任委员。
description.en: During Lai Ching-te's presidency, Chiu Chui-cheng was appointed as the Minister of the Mainland Affairs Council.
